short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can now change all pronouns to they/them

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gender Free is an extension for Chrome that makes the internet gender neutral. It replaces all pronouns with they/them, making it easier for everyone to find information without having to worry about their gender. This extension is perfect for anyone who wants to be more inclusive and make sure everyone feels comfortable when using the internet. With Gender Free, you can change your search results, social media feeds and more to reflect the world we live in today. Everyone deserves to feel comfortable online, and with Gender Free, thatâ€™s now a reality. Try it out today!
